scan_metadata.description: sns - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.description: Checks if topics are not publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check patch update notifications
check_functions.description: Checks for patch update notifications on DocumentDB cluster
